text: Ogier the Dane is a figure from medieval legend. Ogier may also refer to: *Ogier de Busbecq, Austrian diplomat to the Ottoman Empire *Guillem Augier Novella, medieval troubadour *Ogier (law firm), a Jersey-based law firm *Ogier (Wheel of Time), a fictional race of non-human creatures in The Wheel of Time series *Hoger de Laon, music theorist and abbot ==People with the surname== *Barbara Ogier (1648–1720), Flemish playwright *Bulle Ogier (born 1939), French film actor *Sébastien Ogier, French rally driver
title: Ogier (disambiguation)
